revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== From {{suffix|en|Yid|o}}, the [[derogatory]] term for [[Jew]]s being applied due to the large historical Jewish support for the team. ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} # {{lb|en|slang|derogatory}} A [[Jew]]. # {{lb|en|slang}} A supporter of {{w|Tottenham Hotspur F.C.}}
